ideas.name: How might we include elderly people in digitalization?
A voice for the homeless
ideas.description: What about the voice of the homeless? I'm sure they have many inspiring and eye opening stories to tell, but who is listening? Please see attached video for inspiration.

comments.comment: I want to do something similar as in the video. How can I start and can you help me? Any @ServiceDesigners out there?
Great @AdamJonson I'm happy to help with the service design! Let me know.
